meanings.definition: The act of revising or reviewing something.
meanings.sent1: Her revisals of the essay helped improve its clarity.
meanings.sent2: The revisals of the report were necessary before submission.
meanings.sent3: During her revisals, she found a funny typo that made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: His revisals of the manuscript transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The revisals of the painting brought out its true beauty.

meanings.definition: A revised version of a document or text.
meanings.sent1: The final revisals of the book were ready for printing.
meanings.sent2: She compared the revisals of the contract side by side.
meanings.sent3: The revisals of the recipe made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: The revisals of the play turned it into a hit production.
meanings.sent5: His revisals of the speech made it more impactful.
